summary: Tested User Search API and UI features for FRIKT app. Backend tests pass 100% on local environment. CRITICAL: Production Railway backend does NOT have /api/users/search endpoint deployed - returns 404. Frontend code review confirms implementation is correct.

critical.issue: CRITICAL: Endpoint returns 404 on production Railway backend (https://frikt-backend-production.up.railway.app). The code exists locally but is NOT DEPLOYED to production.
Also returns 404 on production - not deployed

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test user search flow because production backend endpoint is not deployed. Frontend will fail with 404 error when trying to search users.

action_items: CRITICAL: Deploy latest backend code to Railway production - the /api/users/search and /api/users/{user_id}/profile endpoints exist locally but are NOT deployed to https://frikt-backend-production.up.railway.app
After deployment, retest the user search functionality end-to-end
critical_code_review_comments: Backend /api/users/search endpoint implementation is correct - tested locally and works
Frontend search.tsx has proper segmented control with Frikts/Users tabs
User card renders avatar (or placeholder), displayName, bio, and posts_count correctly
Navigation to /user/[id] is properly implemented with router.push
Comment input in problem/[id].tsx allows typing without selecting chip first - chips are optional helpers
Empty states are properly implemented for both Frikts and Users search results
data-testid attributes are present on key elements (search-tab-frikts, search-tab-users, user-card-{id})

success_rate.frontend: Unable to test - production backend missing endpoints

context_for_next_testing_agent: Production Railway backend at https://frikt-backend-production.up.railway.app is missing the new user search endpoints. Local backend tests pass. After deployment, test: 1) Search tab switching between Frikts/Users, 2) User search results display, 3) Navigation to user profile, 4) Comment input without chip selection
rca_of_the_issue: The /api/users/search and related user profile endpoints exist in local /app/backend/server.py but return 404 on production Railway backend. This indicates a deployment gap - the code was added but not pushed/deployed to production. The main agent should deploy the latest backend code to Railway.
